(:action shotgun ; Perform a shotgun shot and update the state
  :parameters (?shooter - player ?target - player)
  :precondition (and 
    (has_shotgun ?shooter)
    (or 
      (and (enemy ?target ?shooter) (in_range ?shooter ?target))
      (self ?target ?shooter)
    )
  )
  :effect (or 
    (headshot ?shooter ?target)
    (self_shot ?shooter)
  )

(:action shoot ; Shoot a target with a specified weapon
  :parameters (?player - player ?weapon - weapon ?target - target)
  :precondition (and (has_weapon ?player ?weapon)
                     (loaded ?weapon)
                     (in_range ?player ?target))
  :effect (and (shot ?target ?player))
